object.name: hideGeneralForumTopic
object.description: Use this method to hide the 'General' topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_manage_topics administrator rights. The topic will be automatically closed if it was open. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to hide the 'General' topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_manage_topics administrator rights. The topic will be automatically closed if it was open. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to hide the 'General' topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the *can_manage_topics* administrator rights. The topic will be automatically closed if it was open. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id
